title: Brazil, Spain trade corn and shoes

content.question: The table above shows the amount of labor required to produce a unit of corn and a unit of shoes in Brazil and Spain. If both countries have equal numbers of workers, what pattern of international trade between Brazil and Spain is most likely to emerge?

choices.label: Brazil will export both corn and shoes.
Spain will export both corn and shoes.
No mutually beneficial trade can occur.
Brazil will export corn and import shoes.
Brazil will import corn and export shoes.

content.answer: Brazil will export corn and import shoes.
